item.description: Hey! Iâ€™m Avinash I’m a data architect based out of Charleston, South Carolina. I work at Blackbaud as a Senior BI Developer. I write about data, machine learning, azure and other Microsoft technologies.

item.title: Databricks Cheatsheet
item.description: General Shortcut Description Ctrl + / Multiline comment Cmd + / Toggle line comment Shift + Enter Run command and move to next cell Spark Dataframe Shortcut Description df.head() returns first few rows of a dataframe df.count() returns count of non null values of all columns in a dataframe df.
